title: Species Identification in Biodiversity Science: Crowdsourcing-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Establishing collaborative learning environments via online platforms, emphasizing real-time interaction between experts and novices

learning_goals: Learners can perform biological species identification with over 92% accuracy on a platform similar to iSpot.
Learners can assess the reliability of identification results using a crowdsourcing-based reputation system.
Learners can classify over 80% of observational records within one hour based on peer feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
